name: Reverse Me! Rez/Ru (itch) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
Once upon a time there was a little boy, Russell, who lived in a small village. His grandfather, who liked the nature's calm best, lived in a small house in the woods.

Inspired by the fairy tale of “Little Red Riding Hood”, Reverse Me! Rez/Ru is the sad story of a friendship, a tragedy, and a quest to undo the disaster.

The first of the “Reverse me!” trilogy. Kinetic novel.
